Package: io.vertx.ext.unit

[Java] Interface TestCompletion

  • This object provides callback-ability for the end of a test suite.

    Authors:
    Julien Viet

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        void await()
        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes.
        void await(long timeoutMillis)
        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes with a configurable timeout.
        void awaitSuccess()
        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes and succeeds.
        void awaitSuccess(long timeoutMillis)
        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes and succeeds with a configurable timeout.
        void handler(Handler<AsyncResult<Void>> completionHandler)
        Completion handler for the end of the test, the result is successful when all test cases pass otherwise it is failed.
        boolean isCompleted()
        @return true if the test suite completed
        boolean isFailed()
        @return true if the test suite completed and failed
        boolean isSucceeded()
        @return true if the test suite completed and succeeded
        void resolve(Future future)
        Completes the future when all test cases of the test suite passes, otherwise fails it.

    • Method Detail

      • public void await()

        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes.

        If the current thread is interrupted, an exception will be thrown.

      • public void await(long timeoutMillis)

        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes with a configurable timeout.

        If completion times out or the current thread is interrupted, an exception will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - the timeout in milliseconds

      • public void awaitSuccess()

        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes and succeeds.

        If the current thread is interrupted or the suite fails, an exception will be thrown.

      • public void awaitSuccess(long timeoutMillis)

        Cause the current thread to wait until the test suite completes and succeeds with a configurable timeout.

        If completion times out or the current thread is interrupted or the suite fails, an exception will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        timeoutMillis - the timeout in milliseconds

      • public void handler(Handler<AsyncResult<Void>> completionHandler)

        Completion handler for the end of the test, the result is successful when all test cases pass otherwise it is failed.

        Parameters:
        completionHandler - the completion handler

      • public boolean isCompleted()

        Returns:
        true if the test suite completed

      • public boolean isFailed()

        Returns:
        true if the test suite completed and failed

      • public boolean isSucceeded()

        Returns:
        true if the test suite completed and succeeded

      • public void resolve(Future future)

        Completes the future when all test cases of the test suite passes, otherwise fails it.

        Parameters:
        future - the future to resolve
